titles.title: I Want To Humble Myself Before You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh God, I ask You today
Open my eyes to see who I am.
Let Your Spirit quide me to understand
That only humbled I will follow You.
Chorus:
I want to humble myself before You.
I want to feel your presense in me,
Because I know that I cannot live
If I don't have a broken heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All of my life to the altar I bring,
Here is my praise, my offering.
In paths of justice I want to walk,
And be perfect in Your sight.
